altTitles.ja: 同居したら、秒で食べられました
同居したら、秒で食べられました。～執着系幼なじみの激しめエッチ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyo Shitara, Byo de Taberaremashita: Shuchaku-kei Osananajimi no Hageshime Ecchi

altTitles.en: From Roommates to Bedmates in a Heartbeat -My Clingy Childhood Friend Likes It Rough-
The Moment We Start Living Together, I Get Eaten

altTitles.zh: 同居后、马上被吃干抹凈

altTitles.zh-hk: 同居後、馬上被吃幹抹凈

description.en:
Yuki and Megumi have been friends for as long as they can remember. Even as adults, these neighbors spend practically every waking day together, so it's no surprise that Yuki thinks of Megumi as her dear little brother. But one sudden eviction notice leads to them sharing Megumi's apartment, and Yuki's about to find out his feelings for her are anything but familial...

---
Yukiko is a young woman who teaches calligraphy to children, and has dinner with her next-door neighbor and childhood friend, Megumi. One day, Yukiko's life is turned upside down when she finds an eviction notice in her mailbox. As luck would have it, Megumi's hospitalized mother invites Yukiko to live in their house, since she can't bear to see her son living alone. Yukiko is overjoyed at the chance to eat Megumi's cooking every day and relive the happy sleepovers of the past, but Megumi himself is less than pleased with the arrangement. While Yukiko sees him as her younger brother, he has deeper feelings for her, and wishes she would see him as more...When Yukiko is evicted from her home, her childhood friend's mother invites her to move in with Megumi. Yukiko is clueless about Megumi's feelings for her, causing Megumi to grow ever more frustrated, until he can't contain himself...
description.ja:
「僕のこと、ちゃんと男として見てよ」

彼の大きな手に愛撫されると、気持ちよくて何も考えられなくなる――

お習字教室の先生をしている雪子は
ある日、アパートが取り壊されることになり、真面目で面倒見のいい幼なじみの恵と
一緒に住むことに!　いつものように二人でご飯を
食べて、昔の距離感のまま同じベッドで
寝ようとしたら、突然彼が豹変!?
「僕だって好きな子に触りたいって
欲求くらいあるんだよ」
逞しい腕に組み敷かれ、今まで見たことのない
"男"の顔をした恵が、荒々しいキスをしてきて!?
激情をぶつけるようなセックスに、怖いくらい乱されちゃう――っ!
